long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to create class lists and randomly pick students or randomly group students. You can pick students with repetition or without repetition, like drawing popsicle sticks. The grouper randomly assigns students to groups based on the desired number of students per group or the desired number of teams in total. The groups can be renamed and reorganized after being created.

The background theme, heading color, button color, and animation durations are customizable in the settings.

Privacy concerns: All student data is stored locally or synced with your Google Chrome account if sync is enabled. No student data is sent to the developer in any way.
